author: uyku
long_description:
# drop_blacklisted
This mod adds the /drop [param...] command, which sets a blacklist for unwanted drops. Very useful for mining if used to blacklist cobble and silver sand as shown:

/drop default:cobble default:silver_sand

Each player has their own blacklist. For now, every blacklist is reset when the server resets.

Special thanks to tacotexmex, creator of item_drop of which I... inspired some code, and N7na who helped in the development.
name: drop_blacklisted
short_description: "Don't add the specified drop(s) to the inventory when digging"
title: Drop Blacklisted
